fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Neuvillette quite likes having 3 different element teammates to trigger is Ascension Passive. 
Freeze, Hyperbloom, Electrocharged, Vaporized, etc are all viable.

For teams with Furina, DPS lost by having only 2 stacks of Past Draconic Glories is made up by her personal DMG and buffs provided. (Or get his C1.)
